<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resounding Cascade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2881) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 49 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756)

**Trigger**
You use Arcane Cascade.

</column>

---

When you enter your Arcane Cascade, you disperse the magical reinforcement to nearby allies. You grant the extra damage of Arcane Cascade in an aura affecting all allies in a 5-foot emanation. This uses only the base damage of the stance, based on the ally's weapon specialization; it doesn't use any increase you get from bonuses, the [laughing shadow](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=1) hybrid study, or the like. As normal for duplicate effects, multiple Arcane Cascades affecting the same creature aren't cumulative.
name: Resounding Cascade
